Topic.Title: how do i upload my story....

Posts.EditableText: I have joined this website just few minutes ago....,and I am eagerly waiting to upload some of my interesting short stories..,but i dont know how to do it.It would be great if somebody could help with this small procedure...Please help!!
Posts.HTML: I have joined this website just few minutes ago....,and I am eagerly waiting to upload some of my interesting short stories..,but i dont know how to do it.It would be great if somebody could help with this small procedure...Please help!!

Posts.EditableText: You only compress the game with the other files in .zip file and upload it. You can upload the game in Create section -> Upload game.
Posts.HTML: You only compress the game with the other files in .zip file and upload it. You can upload the game in Create section -> Upload game.
